name: Ajamu WILSON, Petitioner, v. STATE FARM MUTUAL INSURANCE COMPANY, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Wilson v. State Farm Mutual Insurance
docket_number: Petition No. 155 Eastern District Allocatur Docket 1998

parties: Ajamu WILSON, Petitioner, v. STATE FARM MUTUAL INSURANCE COMPANY, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 23rd day of March, 1999, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is granted, the Order of the Superior Court is reversed, and the case is remanded to the Philadelphia County Court of Common Pleas for further proceedings consistent with this court’s decision in Kuropatwa v. State Farm, 554 Pa. 456, 721 A.2d 1067 (1998).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
726 A.2d 1037
Ajamu WILSON, Petitioner, v. STATE FARM MUTUAL INSURANCE COMPANY, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 23, 1999.
